TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AutomationPattern extends System.Windows.Automation.AutomationIdentifier

remarks.format:
## Remarks As instâncias desse tipo identificam padrões de controle específicos. Por exemplo, o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.DockPattern.Pattern?displayProperty=nameWithType> campo identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.DockPattern> padrão de controle.
## Examples O exemplo a seguir exibe o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationIdentifier.ProgrammaticName%2A> de padrões com suporte por um <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.
O exemplo a seguir mostra como solicitar um padrão específico.
[!code-csharp[UIAClient_snip#104](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/CSharp/ClientForm.cs#104)] [!code-vb[UIAClient_snip#104](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/VisualBasic/ClientForm.vb#104)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Windows.Automation.AutomationPattern LookupById(int32 id) cil managed
Public Shared Function LookupById (id As Integer) As AutomationPattern

Docs.summary: Recupera um que encapsula um identificador numérico especificado.
